name: Easy Featured Image
author: Robert Braam

sections.description: On edit.php you will be able to see the currently used featured image for a post. Now you don’t have to open a post to add a featured image. You can do this from the edit.php screen.
sections.installation:
1. Add the following in your functions.php to enable featured images:
  2. Place easy_featured_images into your plugin directoy, and activate it.
  3. Goto your post edit screen to see your featured images
sections.faq:
I don’t see the tumbnails in my theme

You need to put <?php the_post_thumbnail(array( 100,100 )); ?> somewhere in your theme
